comment: Dr. Jezequel was great! This is definitely not an easy class, but she tells you everything you need to know for the 2 tests. It's up to you to put in the work. I would definitely take her again if I could!

Dr. J is a very fun, intellectual woman. Shes always willing to answer questions. Anatomy lab is a hard class but without her as my professor i would not have learned as much as i did at the same level. she is very helpful, shes hilarious, and inspirational.

Dr. Jezequel is probably one of the most amazing professors at KSU. She is very clear and beyond helpful. Anatomy lab is hard class, and she know this so she does everything she possibly can to help us. She makes acronyms and prints out worksheets- the whole nine yards. Jezequel is an exceptionally intelligent woman, she knows her stuff.

Dr. Jezequel is one of the sweetest and most understanding professors at KSU.  She genuinely cares about the well being of her students.  The class material was very challenging for lab.  She didn't tell you what you needed to know for the midterm but turned around and explained the final very well.  Somewhat unorganized at first but gets better.

Dr.J was Awesome! She genuinely wants to see her students do well in her class if she thinks you are studying and wanting to make a good grade.  The class is standardized so their is only a midterm, final, and attendance points.  If you put in the work she will assist you if you ask for help.  The class is tough but an A is achievable

Great lab professor! You have a midterm, final, and a participation grade and that it! Study hard for the exams, they are confusing if you don't. Plus, she gives you bonus points on the exams if you stay at least an hour for the review days. Take her!

I like Jezequel as a person but as a teacher is not so well. She knows so much information that she talks about empty things. She gives no study guide or help with exams. She is cool but never taking her class again. Her tests are very tedious when it comes to information. She grades very quickly, THAT'S A PLUS.

Nice, answers emails, posts grades quickly. GOING TO CLASS helps you narrow down what she is probably going to emphasize on the test. Focuses a little too much on sarcasm/humor when she could use that time to make difficult concepts a little more clear. Read the textbook before class to consider getting an A/B. Many have to WORK to get a passing C

An awesome professor. Very funny and lovable.The beauty  about her is that she gives ways to remember certain things by giving normal day-to-day.TAKE HER for sure. Her tests are straight forward as long as you take notes in her class. Her power points are the best!! Wondered why I bought the book!!!There is just too much stuff to memorize!

Great teacher. There is just so much material. Make sure you READ PRIOR TO CLASS and pay attention in class cause she gives a good amount of ways to help you remember all of this stuff. Jez is sarcastic, so if you can't take the heat do not step in her kitchen. Recommended.

She is the best teacher ever!! She knows her material and is very prepared for class every day. I had her for lecture and she told you basically what was gonna be on the test and as long as you paid attention and did what she said it wasnt bad.  This is ofcourse one of the harder subjects but she made class fun and kept it lively and interesting.

Dr.J. was a very cool lab teacher. She's funny, nice, helpful, and she knows how to explain things in a way students can understand. She's not   strict on the spelling for the lab practicals, and she doesn't grade them harshly. She also offers bonus points on the practicals. Take her for lab if you can! Highly  recommended!!!!!

Dr.Jez is GREAT. She is so much better than all other lab professors. Is not strict on spelling for practicals and does what she can to help you out! Her class is so much fun and I am DEFINITELY taking her next semester as long as it doesn't conflict with another class I need!!
